items.value:
This study aims to measure the mobile Internet audience. 

   As part of the research project, each participant installs a mobile application on their smartphone that captures information about their media consumption in popular mobile applications and web resources.

title: How can I be sure the app is working properly?

items.value:
For correct app operation, you should allow it to run in a background mode.

   The daily stat of the application running will be displayed in the "Statistics" section and is updated with a delay of approximately 3-4 hours.

title: What if the battery on my phone runs out or if I close the app?

items.value: For the correct accrual of activity points, the application must run in the background mode for at least 16 hours a day, mostly during the daytime.

title: Does the app use a lot of battery power?

items.value: We made our app in such a way that it does not affect the way you are used to use your smartphone.

title: The app does't work or I have encountered a technical difficulties

items.value:
If you have any problems with the app, please email us at info@cifrasoft.com and describe your problem. 

 We will try to help you as soon as possible.
